content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) that smelts iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) that smelts copper ore into copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) performing automation research (input: {automation-science-pack: 10}, status: NO_POWER, warning: [not receiving electricity]).
- ElectricityGroup connecting small electric poles at positions (8.5, 6.5), (9.5, 6.5), and (10.5, 7.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(-10.5, 18.5) with warnings [not connected to power network, no input liquid, no fluid present in connections] and connection points at (-10.5, 16.0) and (-10.5, 21.0).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) with warning [out of fuel]; holds a fluid box of approximately 190 units of water at temperature 15, with connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5) and steam output at (-7.5, 24.5); now associated with fluid_system [77302].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) (status: WORKING) delivering about 99 units of water; now associated with fluid_system [77302].
- Manual Fuel Feeding System represented by a wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5).
- Pipeline Network comprising:
  • PipeGroup at position(-5.5, 19.5) with fluid_system 77302 (status: WORKING).
  • PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 19.5) with fluid_system 77301 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(5.5, 21.5) with fluid_system 77314 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 23.5) with fluid_system 77313 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system 77309 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(0.5, 24.5) with fluid_system 77318 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 25.5) with fluid_system 77317 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 27.5) with fluid_system 77320 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(4.5, 27.5) with fluid_system 77321 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system 77322 (status: EMPTY).

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Inventory Attribute Validation:
 - Use only supported inventory attributes when accessing inventory items to avoid attribute mismatches.

• Steam Engine Repositioning and Connection Attempts:
 - Repeated attempts to reposition and connect the steam engine failed due to the absence of candidate pipe groups with the specified fluid_system values (attempted: 76638, 76722, 76804, 76888 for repositioning and 76970, 77054, 77136, 77220 for connection) within a 10-tile radius of Position(-5.5, 19.5). Ensure that pipeline entities are correctly placed and assigned the appropriate fluid_system identifiers, or adjust the search parameters to secure valid candidates.
